data.name: Master Wulder
data.detailed_description:
Master Vulder is an archery shooter with unique mechanics.


You have to play for the god of archery. In the early stages of his rise. While in the native lands of Idalir, you are free to do with your enemies as you wish. Your bow and arrows have served you faithfully for a long time.
Hunt, evolve, collect the souls of enemies. You will need many souls to be recognized by the gods of Asgard as equals. As your character develops, you will be able to make friends with forest dwellers such as foxes, raccoons, wolves, bears, hares, birds. Each of them has distinctive features. For example, enlisting With the help of raccoon thieves, you will not have problems finding arrows. The raccoons themselves will bring them to you. Shoot, run, pull out arrows - all this will help you in the development of the main character. Start your journey as a young god, earn glory in battles, the more souls you collect, the more followers among people and animals you will gain. They will help you. Followers will set up altars for you, among which you can find offerings left for you.

The difficulty of the game increases with each defeated opponent. Each new opponent will be stronger, faster and more cunning than the previous ones. Where one died, new ones will come!

A simple shooting system using crosshairs in the past. Aim with your senses. Keep a close eye on the number of arrows in your body. A large number of arrows can cause bleeding - take them out!

Peculiarities

Realistic Archery System.

Unique body control system based on inversion kinematics
Maneuvering Enemies
Adaptive system to increase the difficulty of the game
Cinematic effect of an arrow flying on a fatal shot
Development statistics management system, become the best player!

Future Features

Increasing the skill and number of souls will increase the number of followers of your god
More followers - more of your altars on the map, and this is healing and additional equipment
Developing your character as a god will open up the possibility of participating in the tournament of gods with other players / high-class AI
Opening different groups of armor depending on the development of the status of a god
The system of reactions to damage in various parts of the body
Allies and their development together with you
Procedural formation of squads and camps by mobs in random places
Cave creatures with unique logic for hiding and attacking as the time of day changes
An alchemy system that allows you to more fully reveal the hunter's instinct, your characteristics and increase your chances of survival
Advanced character editor and equipment customization
Co-op mode and match mode between players
Separate character for the cooperative mode with a unique development system
Melee system with the ability to choose the direction of attack
Combat system with shields, axes and other melee weapons
Advanced fauna with unique interactions with each of the animal types

Foxes - Search For Opponents On the Map

Raccoons - Loot collectors

Wolves Are Universal Companions

Bears Are Melee Defenders

Hares - reconnaissance of the current location of opponents
Birds - announcing the approaching threat

data.short_description: You are Wulder, the future god of archery. Hunt in the forests of Idalir, collect souls. Prove to everyone that you are the best among the gods.

Recommended:
  • OS: WIndows
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 PRO 1200
  • Memory: 16000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 2060
  • DirectX: Version 12
